component.name: GSEAHeatmap
component.doc: Heatmap summarizing GSEA results across multiple pairwise comparisons.
component.author: Christian Frech

input.name: enrichedUp
input.doc: Array of CSV files containing pair-wise enrichment results for up-regulated genes.

input.name: enrichedDown
input.doc: Array of CSV files containing pair-wise enrichment results for down-regulated genes.

parameter.name: regexGeneSetNames
parameter.doc: Regular expression matching gene set names to be included in heatmap.

parameter.name: regexGeneSetNamesExclude
parameter.doc: Regular expression matching gene set names to be excluded from heatmap.

parameter.name: regexCategoryNames
parameter.doc: Regular expression matching gene set categories to be included in heatmap.

parameter.name: regexCategoryNamesExclude
parameter.doc: Regular expression matching gene set categories to be excluded from heatmap.

parameter.name: sigCutoff
parameter.doc: FDR cut-off for a gene set to be considered as statistically significantly enriched. These gene sets will be marked with an asterisk in the heatmap. If parameter 'RFilterExpr' is not set, only gene sets are included that reach this level of statistical significance in at least one of the comparisons.

parameter.name: hsigCutoff
parameter.doc: FDR cut-off for a gene set to be considered as highly statistically significantly enriched. These gene sets will be marked with a double-asterisk in the heatmap.

parameter.name: RFilterExpr
parameter.doc: Evaluated R expression to decide which gene sets to include in heatmap. Example: "FDR.q.val.iAMPvsNoniAMP < 0.001"

parameter.name: NESCutoff
parameter.doc: Minimum normalized enrichment score (NES) for a gene set to be included. If set to zero (default), no NES filtering is performed.

parameter.name: figureHeight
parameter.doc: Height of Latex figure in cm.
